document_data.name: The Measure House
document_data.mainbody: '''The Measure House''' was a temple in [[Calimport]] dedicated to the worship of the god [[Anachtyr]].
document_data.Location: The Measure House was located in [[Masal Drudach]], part of the [[Bakkal Sabban]] of the [[Calimport/Faiths Ward|Faiths Ward]], in Calimport.
document_data.Structure: This building stood six stories tall and was topped with a minaret that stood another six stories tall.
